attributes.action: Legalise weed and implement a tax on it.
attributes.additional_details:
There is a big influx of weed dealers nationwide and the country could benefit from freeing people using weed from prisons or even dealing.
This will free up spaces in prison and even benefit us for the greater good.
attributes.background: Legalise weed and implement a tax onto it to increase government revenue etc.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: 

Legalise recreational cannabis & release those convicted of cannabis offences.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707970
